doc.title: Deaf Perspectives
doc.plot: Informative talk show done in American Sign Language with voice interpretation for hearing audiences, this series had episodes addressing: "Domestic Violence in the Deaf Community: How drug and alcohol abuse contribute to the Violence", "Domestic Violence in th deaf Community Part 2: In Depth", "American's with Disabilities Act", "HIV/AIDS in the Deaf Community", "HIV/AIDS - One Deaf Man's Experience", "Shattering the Silence: Deaf in TV & Film"
